Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Dear all,

For a while now I have tried to make a HyperNEAT experiment to do
classification tasks, but I can't seem to get it learning right. The
accuracy just does not improve beyond a certain value 0.655222, which is the
percentage of benign tumors in the dataset. Essentially, the algorithm is a
ZeroR classifier... Can anybody spot my mistake? Hope so!

Regards,
Jan

--00248c0501e51c8ab004981302b8
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
